pages.text: Canisters are a fast and compact way for players to store Herb Blends.
Iron Canisters can only hold up to 2 Herb Blends, making it the lowest tier that you can craft.
Amethyst Canisters can hold up to 4 Herb Blends, with it being the second tier that you can craft.
Diamond Canisters can hold up to 6 Herb Blends, which makes it the highest tier that you can currently craft.
These entries may also be useful in your studies.
